parameters.name: Count
parameters.description: Number of solid bodies to affect

title: IMirrorPatternFeatureData.IGetFeatureScopeBodies
description: Gets the solid bodies that the mirror pattern feature affects in a multibody part.

parameters.name: Count
parameters.description: Number of solid bodies to affect

returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of solid bodies of size Count VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
Before calling this method, call
IMirrorPatternFeatureData::GetFeatureScopeBodiesCount
to get the value for Count.
See
Accessing Selections that Define Features
for additional details on using this method.
